00020 class OscillatoryDeltaCorrInputRef
00021         : public ConfigBase
00022         , public ManageableInput
00023 {
00024     friend std::ofstream & operator<<(std::ofstream & os, const OscillatoryDeltaCorrInputRef & cir);
00025 public:
00027 
00030     typedef CorrInputMech<OscillatoryDeltaCorrInputRef> related_component;
00031 
00033     MAKE_VISITABLE(OscillatoryDeltaCorrInputRef)
00034 
00035 public:
00036 //  OscillatoryDeltaCorrInputRef(double base_rate, double oscil_freq, double oscil_amplitude, double correlation);
00037     OscillatoryDeltaCorrInputRef(std::ifstream & is);
00038     inline const double & rate_when_not_correlated() const {
00039         return effective_correl_rate_;
00040     }
00041     inline const double & rate_when_correlated() const {
00042         return effective_correl_rate_;
00043     }
00044     inline const bool & correlated_event_state() const {
00045         return correlated_event_state_;
00046     }
00047 private:
00048     void input_update();
00049     double base_rate_;
00050     double oscil_amplitude_;
00051     double oscil_freq_;
00052     double correlation_;
00053     double actual_rate_, effective_correl_rate_; // actual variables submitted to oscillations
00054     bool correlated_event_state_;
00055 };
00056 
00057 
00058 
00060 // inline definitions
00062 
00064 // updates the correlation state of a correlated group neuron
00065 inline void OscillatoryDeltaCorrInputRef::input_update()
00066 {
00067     actual_rate_ = base_rate_ + oscil_amplitude_ * sin(oscil_freq_ * SimEnv::sim_time());
00068     // test if correlated event
00069     if (RandomGenerator::probability_trial_for_time_step(actual_rate_)) {
00070         effective_correl_rate_ = sqrt(correlation_) / SimEnv::timestep() + actual_rate_ * (1 - sqrt(correlation_));
00071         correlated_event_state_ = true;
00072     } else {
00073         effective_correl_rate_ = actual_rate_ * (1 - sqrt(correlation_));
00074         correlated_event_state_ = false;
00075     }
00076 }
